data.name: Idle Champions - Blight Druid Voronika Theme Pack
data.detailed_description:
Every wizard needs a familiar, right?

Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as leveling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using ultimates. Depending on the assigned task, a Familiar will click a certain number of times per second/minute.

Skins are alternate looks for your Champions that you can swap in and out whenever you want!

Feats are small, Champion-specific buffs that can be unlocked and assigned to your Champions. They offer an additional level of customization for your favorite Champions — and may even provide some new formation opportunities!

In this pack:

Unlocks the Champion Voronika (if you don't already have them)
Blight Druid Voronika Skin
Hemlock the Kamadan Familiar
An Epic Feat for Voronika
1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter
16 Gold Voronika Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
